EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WELCOME TO BLUEWAVE MADNESS CELEBRATE YOUR ELITE STATUS AT THE ELITE EIGHT.
We know selling solar in the winter can be a challenge, to reward you for achieving Tier 1 Status with BlueWave we are offering a MAD promotion.
Sell the most solar in February and we send you 2 tickets to the NCAA East Regional Championship ELITE EIGHT GAME in Boston.
THAT'S RIGHT. SELL SOLAR, GET TICKETS.
As our Tier 1 Partners, your companies represent our best partnerships in the Northeast. Now let's find the best sales reps in the region!
We will be tracking loan volume and Community Solar shares sold to determine our winner.
And we have a SUPER ELITE prize...
GRAND PRIZE
2 tickets 2018 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball EAST REGIONAL Elite Eight Championship Game
Sunday, March 25th, 2018 TD Garden, Boston, MA
LET THE GAMES BEGIN! We can't wait to see who wins it all.
- All of us here at BlueWave
TERMS & CONDITIONS:
Sales must be tracked to individual Sales Rep email addresses in Salesforce, no combined company efforts will qualify for tickets Mass Solar Loan sales are not eligible for this promotion Minimum of 4 loans closed to win Minimum of 4 Community Solar shares sold to win Loans sold between 7:00AM on Thursday, February 1st and 11:00PM on Wednesday, February 28th are eligible for this promotion We will announce the winning sales rep on Friday, March 2nd, 2018 via phone call from your BlueWave partner BlueWave will not cover any associated travel expenses to attend these games Tickets will be in the balcony section, enjoy the experience with the real fans!
BLUEWAVE SOLAR | PARTNER SUPPORT | (888) 817-2703
THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING OUR MISSION TO PROVIDE SOLAR FOR EVERYONE, EVERYWHERE.
